DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect ARIMIDEX pharmacokinetics tamoxifen effect tamoxifen pharmacokinetics ARIMIDEX..
DOC.criteria: Eligible entry main ATAC trial 1033IL/0029 Patients must take ATAC trial medication least 3 month ( i.e . patient must reach least visit 2 main ATAC study ) Patients take medication morning least 3 month Patients must 100 % compliant precede fourteen day Excluded entry main ATAC trial ( 1033IL/0029 ) Patients whose concurrent treatment include diazepam drug might affect tamoxifen steady state level steroid hormone status . These include ketoconazole ( antifungal ) relate compound
